abstract: In this Letter, the first name of author Virendra K. Chaudhri was incorrectly spelled ‘Viren’; author Meenakshi Venkatasubramanian should also be associated with ‘Department of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science, University of Cincinnati, Cincinnati, Ohio 45221, USA’; authors Bruce J. Aronow, Nathan Salomonis, Harinder Singh and H. Leighton Grimes should also be associated with ‘Department of Pediatrics, University of Cincinnati College of Medicine, Cincinnati, Ohio 45229, USA’. The Letter has not been corrected online.
